program_1.task: Ion implantation of phosphorus (P) for n-type doping in silicon substrate

sub_htps.task: Calculate optimal implant energy and dose for desired junction depth and carrier concentration
sub_htps.note: Energy determines penetration depth, dose determines final concentration

sub_htps.task: Set up implant conditions including beam current, tilt angle, and rotation

program_2.task: Boron (B) implantation for p-type doping with shallow junction formation

sub_htps.task: Optimize implant parameters for shallow p+ junctions
sub_htps.note: Lower energy for shallower junctions, higher dose for better activation

sub_htps.task: Plan annealing schedule for dopant activation and damage repair
sub_htps.note: Rapid thermal annealing (RTA) preferred to minimize diffusion

program_3.task: Arsenic (As) high-dose implantation for heavily doped source/drain regions

sub_htps.task: Set up high-dose arsenic implant with damage minimization
sub_htps.note: High dose may cause amorphization; consider preheat or multiple implants
